channel.title: Project Scratch - Improving PI
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt][b]Hello, Project scratch is a project that our development team is working on to make people's perspective on PI better. We will be using a blank PI source We currently have 4 people on our development team. This is some media of the base that we will be using to do this project.[/b][/size]
[IMG]http://i1253.photobucket.com/albums/hh582/yambar1/ProjectScratch.png[/img]
[b]Development Team[/b] Yambar (Me) Alex (Best Friend of interwebs) Tristan Kyle
[b]Experience[/b] Yambar - Programming Java/RSPS(Anything) for 8 months. Alex - Programming Java/RSPS(317/718) for 9 months. Tristan - Programming Java/RSPS(Delta) for 4 months. Kyle - Programming Java/RSPS(718) for 2 years.
[b]Application[/b]
[size=12pt][b]Skype: Java knowledge: Latest/greatest updates you've accomplished: Dedicated? Y/N: Misc(any extra info you'd like to add):[/b][/size][/center]

item.title: Project Scratch - Improving PI
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:477051”][quote author=m0ssyh0s link=topic=595242.msg4191771#msg4191771 date=1356912722]
Incorrect statement. You could rewrite the entire thing.
[/quote]

[quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=595242.msg4191452#msg4191452 date=1356862985]
Unless you completely reworked it which would mean it wouldn’t be PI anymore.
[/quote][/quote]
Lol thats what you gotta do to learn so I guess this is good =D

Read full topic

item.title: Project Scratch - Improving PI
item.dc:creator: @m0ssyh0s m0ssyh0s
item.description:
@m0ssyh0s wrote:

Lin:

The problem with PI is you can’t make it better. It’s a mess based on a poor design and has had tons of other designs mixed in with it. Also 4 people seems like a lot for a project such as this. Good luck nonetheless I guess.

Incorrect statement. You could rewrite the entire thing.

Read full topic
